title: Kindred spirits (Captioned)
creator_credit: Alan Fisk, Alan Burke and ABC-TV (Australia)
brief_description: Julie Nelson, a young dancer on the Sydney club circuit, witnesses the drowning of a young man and finds her life falling apart. It is a horrifying experience, but what is even more disturbing is that his presence continues to haunt her. The key to the mystery is held and withheld by an eccentric old lady.
